details:
adjective
- lacking consistency
= synonyms: scratchy
- (of a contest or contestants) not fairly matched as opponents
= example: (of a contest or contestants) not fairly matched as opponents
= synonyms: mismatched
- not even or uniform as e.g. in shape or texture
= example: not even or uniform as e.g. in shape or texture
- not divisible by two
= synonyms: odd
- variable and recurring at irregular intervals
= example: variable and recurring at irregular intervals
